full_summary:
=================

### 5P414-220153 - Highway Maintenance - Wood Buffalo National Park

**Tender ID:** WS3712619418
**Amendment Number:** A2
**Publication Date:** March 27, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** May 9, 2023 (14:00:00)

### Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit proposals for the provision of highway maintenance services at Wood Buffalo National Park. The project scope includes maintenance, repair, and upkeep of highway infrastructure within the park.

### Procurement Details

* **Unspsc:** 72141003 - Highway and road maintenance service
* **Procurement Category:** CNST (Construction and Services Trades)
* **Notice Type:** Directed Contract
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Traditional
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

### Delivery Regions

The successful bidder will be required to deliver services in the following regions:

* Alberta
* Fort Smith
* Northwest Territories

### Contracting Entity

The contracting entity for this project is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC). Contact information for the contracting entity is as follows:

* **Name:** Alison Guilford (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** alison.guilford@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

### End User Entities

The end user entities for this project are:

* Parks Canada Agency (PC)
